decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings and documents: MSA 010 (pr) Rev P2 (Ground Floor Plan as Revised Proposed), MSA 011 (pr) Rev P2 (First Floor Plan as Revised Proposed), MSA 020 (pr) Rev P2 (Rear Elevation as Revised Proposed), MSA 021 (pr) Rev P2 (Side Elevation as Revised Proposed) and MSA 030 (pr) Rev P2 (Section AA as Revised Proposed).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within Section 11 of the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, and policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment in (S73) to vary condition 2 (approved drawings) in relation to planning permission reference 164369HH dated 07/11/2016 for 'Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing addition)'. Amendments seek to create a glazed bay projection to the rear elevation (Retrospective Application).
